name: Denali
hint: Highest peak in North America, in Alaska, formerly called Mount McKinley

name: Mount Logan
hint: Highest mountain in Canada, in the Yukon's Saint Elias Mountains

name: Mount Rainier
hint: Iconic volcanic peak near Seattle, Washington, covered in glaciers

name: Pikes Peak
hint: Famous Colorado summit that inspired 'America the Beautiful'

name: Mount Whitney
hint: Highest peak in the contiguous United States, in California's Sierra Nevada

name: Mount Elbert
hint: Highest peak in the Rocky Mountains, in Colorado

name: Grand Teton
hint: Highest peak of the Teton Range in Wyoming

name: Mount Mitchell
hint: Highest peak east of the Mississippi River, in North Carolina

name: Mauna Kea
hint: Tallest mountain from base to peak on Earth, a dormant volcano in Hawaii

name: Mount St. Helens
hint: Volcano in Washington state that erupted catastrophically in 1980
